snippet: Firefighters battling a blaze in this arid region were relieved last month when the fire headed for a large wetland -- until it went underground, igniting an ancient peat bog.    ''What we thought was our saving grace turned out to be our worst ni...
lead_paragraph: Firefighters battling a blaze in this arid region were relieved last month when the fire headed for a large wetland -- until it went underground, igniting an ancient peat bog. ''What we thought was our saving grace turned out to be our worst nightmare,'' said the fire chief at Vandenberg, Tom Stevens.
abstract: Firefighters are searching for way to contain smouldering underground fire in peat bog at Vandenberg Air Force Base in California (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Underground Fire Smolders in Peat Bog
